title: Cod in tomato and white wine
ingredients: ['6 vine tomatoes', '1 tablespoon cooking oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2-3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1-2 red chillies, deseeded and chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'smaller handful of parsley, chopped', 'handful of basil, chopped', '250ml white wine (or more if adventurous)', '2 cod loins (or any hearty white fish)', '8 to 10 king prawns (uncooked, but peeled if possible)']
